title: I FINALLY reached level 30 after 3 years.
body:
I've had a level 24 account for so, SO long. I'd made an account in NA but after levelling up to 24, I found out that it was the geographically wrong server to play on (I live in the Middle East so it was horrible) so I had to use the EUW server which didn't work out most of the time as well. 

I went through 20+ 20 minute leaverbusters to fight with my internet issues. Player support couldn't solve my internet problems. I got accepted into the PBE even if I wasn't level 30, and since the connection was much better there I forgot about live servers for about a year.

Once I started getting better internet, I resumed my play. I finally reached level 30 from 24 over the last 2 months.
That's 3 levels in one month. I still can't believe it. I don't even play that much, kappa

*So I started playing since Lucian came out. ;_; I'm really excited for ranked tho*

Well this is a really meaningless but meaningful post. Have a great day everyone!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Congratulations! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Thank you!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
https://media1.giphy.com/media/slOhiKAVFgwr6/giphy.gif
http://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m0g658Xkrt1rqfhi2o1_500.gif
oh so ur the one who kept rage quitting
no that was me
oh ok
Maybe I was ;)
No that was lee sin  ;-; hes blind thats why he dc
no that was me

The new player experience is really, really crushing.

Recently did a new account (this one) because I didn't play league for a long time and I wanted to recover some stuff because I forgot them. Oh god. Oh god!!! I got back to my old account. I went to lvl 24 but it was terrible. So many champions, runes, and, as you said, the time it takes to reach lvl 30.

That's true. Runes... runes ;_; I'm broke after buying runes... I want to buy champions but runes took all my ip.

It's also horrible how the system matches you with either people who are too good or people who are too new to this game. Hopefully the new champ select has cleared things up.
I made a second account and reached level 12 in two days........ wtf am I doing
First 10 levels go a LOT faster than the last 10.
This was how I felt. My smurfs on other servers are mostly over level 10 even if I haven't played on them that much.
It should be the opposite, once you show dedicated, then you should be awarded with more levels
Well, I have no life, so I made it to level 30 in less than 2 months.
Well that's a pretty grand accomplishment :o I wish I could do that..

I'm sorry to tell you this. But, unless that's a smurf or you feel like spending a lot of money, you'll never get all of the Champions until about 3 years from now (maybe less than 2 if you are dedicated enough to play to get 2,000 IP a day or about 23 wins a day).

Very true, but if you're like me you don't enjoy playing over half the champion pool (I have 60+ champs but only really like playing around 40, and even then the ones I mastered are much narrower. I also try champions on free rotation and most I find boring if I don't own...)

Its been a goal of mine since so long ago to be able to play as whomever I want, whenever I want. I've been working at it for so long, and though I don't play every champion all the time, I try to play a lot of them whenever I can. I think I'm finally at champ #101 and working on #102. I'm ready to finish this because soon, heh-heh, I'll start buying Runes and Rune pages. Watch out League, if I can be average without Runes, wait until I have some to use.

Ah, well good luck! The only reason I'm building towards max champs is for the small fact that I would like to get into ranked seriously at least at some point in my life, and trading is big in higher elo so I wanna be extra prepared. :P

I hope league is alive 3 years from now... I don't think I'll ever get all the champs.
That's why we all want to go to the PBE... *huehuehue*
Lol, that's also what I do from time to time.

> I live in the Middle East so it was horrible

huh. that's weird. i spent a few months in the middle east last year. kuwait, to be exact. i kept playing on the na server while skyping friends. didnt have a single issue
Maybe I'm using too cheap of an internet. I never got to solve the problem tho.
think wisely b4 ranked, we all know whats behind that mask...

C'mon, we all do...
We just try to ignore them. *:)*
Glad to hear man :D welcome to NA

Yeah, I've heard it's the beginning of LoL when you reach lvl 30.
xD Have fun in your games!
That was a one long journey to get lvl 30. Mine took like 8 months, but man, did that already felt like eternity. Enjoy rankeds.
I dunno if I'm ready to *enjoy* ranked.... GLHF in your games too :)
